description: Dundee midfielder Lyall Cameron may miss out against future employers Rangers on Saturday evening, Dens Park manager Tony Docherty has revealed.
title: Lyall Cameron: Dundee midfielder may miss out against next club Rangers
title_page: Lyall Cameron: Dundee midfielder may miss out against next club Rangers - BBC Sport
maintext:
Dundee midfielder Lyall Cameron may miss out against future employers Rangers on Saturday evening, Dens Park manager Tony Docherty has revealed.
Cameron, 22, has signed a pre-contract to move to Ibrox this summer and has scored 10 goals in 36 games for the Dark Blues so far this season.
"Lyall picked up a wee injury in Tuesday's training, just at the end of the session, and he's getting sent for a scan this afternoon, so we'll see what comes back from that," said Docherty.
"We don't know how serious it is at the moment. It's always a blow when your best players are not available. You want your best players in the team."
